name: P12
label: User notification about third-party requests for user information
description: The company should notify users to the extent legally possible when their user information has been demanded by governments and other third parties.
guidance: We expect companies to clearly disclose a commitment to notifying users when governments and other third parties request data about its users. We acknowledge that this notice may not be possible in legitimate cases of an ongoing investigation; however, we expect companies to specify what types of requests they are prohibited by law from disclosing.
